items.sentence: Tom lives with his mother, and Mary lives with her father.
I saw a car parked outside your house yesterday afternoon.
I ran back towards the campsite to see what was happening.
I started to walk faster when I heard footsteps behind me.
Tom was supposed to meet me there, but he never showed up.
We've had exceptionally low temperatures for a whole week.
I have a lot of flowers. Some are red and some are yellow.
On the fifteenth of August, thousands of people fly kites.
Tom grew up in Australia, but he now lives in New Zealand.
The only foreign language that I'm very good at is French.
